docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, March 13-- United Nations diplomats reported today that the idea of unifying Korea by military victory throughout the country was being quietly dropped.
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, March 13-- United Nations diplomats reported today that the idea of unifying Korea by military victory throughout the country was being quietly dropped.
docs.abstract: UN diplomats reptd dropping idea of unifying Korea by mil means; cite resolution to restore peace in S Korea; hold resolution on unification impossible to implement as result of China intervention; see decision on where to stabilize UN lines up to mil leaders; some back halt near 38th Parallel; see mil cease-fire separating Korea question from other Far East problems

headline.main: U.N. docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, March 14-- La Nacion, lone independent newspaper, has settled with the news venders union, which had demanded an additional centavo for each copy of the paper for the union's welfare funds.
